ThingDef.label: Knowledge Seeker
ThingDef.description: An energy bow made from the essence of knowledge, fashioned with a sophisticated targeting system, the energized arrow, upon hitting a sentience target, will absorb all forms of knowledge they have into an energized particle, before sending it back to the weapon,the weapon then transfer these knowledge to its wielder. This process will greatly damage the victim brain, making them lose the ability to think. \n\n Deals <color=#5F57A5>Celestial</color> damage.

ThingDef.label: Frigid Star
ThingDef.description: A staff forged from the essence of frost, Capable of displaying various forms of attack, the essence of frost imbued within granting its wielder immunity to cold, each attack from this staff inflicts target with a freezing curse, which will eventually kill its victim once the cold energy is sufficient. \n\n Deals <color=#5F57A5>Celestial</color> damage.

ThingDef.label: ME-A1
ThingDef.description: A Makainian homing-type weapon, its body is made entirely from celestial steel; a dimensional uplink is embedded within its core. Upon pulling the trigger, it connects to an energy field deep within the 5th dimension, gathering dimensional energy into the core before launching it. The target is embedded with an energy signature upon pulling the trigger, making the projectile seek out the target with the same signature. the energy drawing from the 5th dimension enhance this weapon, making each cycle faster the longer it fire toward the target with matching energy signature. \n\n Deals <color=#5F57A5>Celestial</color> damage.

ThingDef.label: ME-G1
ThingDef.description: A Makainian bombarding-type weapon, fashioned with sophisticated Makainian technology. A dimensional unlink is embedded within its core, connecting to an energy field within the 5th dimension. Upon pulling the trigger, it gathers a highly volatile energy mass within the weapon before launching it toward the target area, devastating anything caught by it.​ \n\n Deals <color=#5F57A5>Celestial</color> damage.
